snippet: The campaign by MODCo, in response to a drop in plus-size sales, features print ads, a revamped Web site and Facebook pages, new logos and other initiatives.
abstract: Jane L Levere Advertising column notes that Lane Bryant, the women's plus-size fashion retailer, is introducing an ad and marketing campaign to make its clothing and lingerie more relevant to current and prospective customers.
lead_paragraph: The campaign by MODCo, in response to a drop in plus-size sales, features print ads, a revamped Web site and Facebook pages, new logos and other initiatives.

headline.seo: Lane Bryant Introduces New Advertising and Marketing Campaign
headline.main: A Print Focus Returns in Lane Bryant Campaign
